svg.title: Norway Rat Cardiovascular System — Anterior Cross-Section
svg.desc: Interactive SVG of a Norway rat heart showing all four chambers, great vessels, valves, and major vasculature for pre-veterinary and biomedical anatomy study.

g.text: R = Right (viewer left) ← → L = Left (viewer right)

svg.text: AnatoView v1.0.0 — Norway Rat Cardiovascular Model — 14 labeled structures
